sentence: Thank you Fairmont for a wonderful Christmas experience
The swimming pool is gorgeous and gives swimmers a good view of the hotel as well as its scenic surounding No free wi fi for residing guests and wi fi fee is relatively high
Great hotel fantastic experience

Cold Stone Creamery is an absolute must to go not only for the best icecream you will ever taste but for the entertainment of the staff throwing ice cream and catching it across the room amazes everyone who entersI could not explain to anyone how much I love coming to Dubai and this being the hotel I have to spend my time there in its just sensational and incredible for making memories at
Great memories of this place
The club lounge and breakfast were great the aquaventure park and the fish Aquariums were a great fun experience
From the moment we arrived we where amazed by the surroundings
The location and general hotel facilities are very good the setting within gardens and pathways is very nice and relaxing
Dolphin experience was great
We went as a family of four for a long weekend to experience the Atlantis vibe and swim with the dolphins the resort did exactly what it says it would do
But Atlantis gives you a cattle experience
Overall experience was great but would not like to do it again
We have stayed at this Hotel in the past and had a good experience so went back even though it was quite expensive
i have never experienced such amazing hotel
That also pretty much determines the dining room ambiance which is like a high decibel canteen full of people
What a bad experience definitely I will not return back
We did the dolphin experience but only purchased one picture i would have loved more but again very expensive
I have called Atlantis twice in order to make a reservation and it was a poor experience
Overall experience was good but due to my circumstances i had to check in extremely late

Watch out for extras although drinks packages were great value disappointed that my swimming experience was not on the website given on the ticket site which is very annoying as I was hoping to see pictures and share with my family and friends
Our day at the water park is a particularly favourite memory
It ’s not cheap but well worth the experience
An experience of a lifetime we had at the Atlantis
Do n’t miss this beautiful hotel and its surroundings
It was great experience for whole family
